question: What is the full of the electric vehicle scheme FAME?
option1: Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles
option2: Faster Adoption with Manufacturing and providing electricity
option3: Finer Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles
option4: Finer adjustment and manufacturing of Electric vehicles
answer: Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles
explanation: FAME(Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles) scheme was launched in 2015. It was launched to promote electric vehicles.
